title: Billionaire wealth jumps three times faster in 2025 to highest peak ever, sparking dangerous political inequality
content: Billionaire wealth jumps three times faster in 2025 to highest peak ever, sparking dangerous political inequality Lisa.Rutherford Mon, 01/19/2026 - 00:01 Off                       Billionaires 4,000 times more likely to hold political office than ordinary people Billionaire wealth jumped by over 16 per cent in 2025, three times faster than the past five-year average, to $18.3 trillion â€“ its highest level in history, according to a new Oxfam ...
creator: Lisa.Rutherford
sourceTitle: Oxfam International - The future is equal
